00015 void linalg_qrsolve(ub::vector<double> &x, ub::matrix<double> &A, ub::vector<double> &b, ub::vector<double> *residual)
00016 {
00017 #ifdef NOGSL
00018     throw std::runtime_error("linalg_qrsolve is not compiled-in due to disabling of GSL - recompile libtools with '--with-gsl'");
00019 #else
00020     gsl_matrix_view m
00021         = gsl_matrix_view_array (&A(0,0), A.size1(), A.size2());
00022 
00023     gsl_vector_view gb
00024         = gsl_vector_view_array (&b(0), b.size());
00025 
00026     gsl_vector *gsl_x = gsl_vector_alloc (x.size());
00027     gsl_vector *tau = gsl_vector_alloc (x.size());
00028     gsl_vector *gsl_residual = gsl_vector_alloc (b.size());
00029 
00030     gsl_linalg_QR_decomp (&m.matrix, tau);
00031 
00032     gsl_linalg_QR_lssolve (&m.matrix, tau, &gb.vector, gsl_x, gsl_residual);
00033 
00034     for (size_t i =0 ; i < x.size(); i++)
00035         x(i) = gsl_vector_get(gsl_x, i);
00036 
00037     if(residual)
00038         for (size_t i =0 ; i < residual->size(); i++)
00039             (*residual)(i) = gsl_vector_get(gsl_residual, i);
00040 
00041 
00042     gsl_vector_free (gsl_x);
00043     gsl_vector_free (tau);
00044     gsl_vector_free (gsl_residual);
00045 #endif
00046 }
00047 
00048 void linalg_constrained_qrsolve(ub::vector<double> &x, ub::matrix<double> &A, ub::vector<double> &b, ub::matrix<double> &constr)
00049 {
00050 #ifdef NOGSL
00051     throw std::runtime_error("linalg_constrained_qrsolve is not compiled-in due to disabling of GSL - recompile libtools with '--with-gsl'");
00052 #else
00053     // Transpose constr:
00054     constr = trans(constr);
00055 
00056     const int N = b.size();
00057     const int ngrid = x.size()/2;
00058 
00059     // temporary variables
00060     ub::matrix<double> Q(2*ngrid, 2*ngrid);       // Q matrix: QR decomposition of trans(B)
00061     ub::matrix<double> Q_k(2*ngrid, 2*ngrid);
00062     ub::identity_matrix<double> I (2*ngrid);
00063     ub::vector<double> v(2*ngrid);
00064 
00065     Q = ub::zero_matrix<double>(2*ngrid, 2*ngrid);
00066     Q_k = ub::zero_matrix<double>(2*ngrid, 2*ngrid);
00067     v = ub::zero_vector<double>(2*ngrid);
00068 
00069     double *tmp = & constr(0,0);
00070     gsl_matrix_view gsl_constr
00071       = gsl_matrix_view_array (tmp, constr.size1(), constr.size2());
00072 
00073     tmp = &b(0);
00074     gsl_vector_view gsl_b
00075          = gsl_vector_view_array (tmp, b.size());
00076 
00077 
00078     gsl_vector *tau_qr = gsl_vector_alloc (ngrid);
00079 
00080     gsl_linalg_QR_decomp (&gsl_constr.matrix, tau_qr);
00081 
00082     Q = I;
00083 
00084     for (int k = ngrid; k > 0 ; k--) {
00085 
00086         for (int icout = 0; icout < k - 1; icout++) {
00087              v(icout) = 0;
00088         }
00089         v(k - 1) = 1.0;
00090 
00091         for (int icout = k; icout < 2*ngrid; icout++) {
00092              v(icout) = gsl_matrix_get(&gsl_constr.matrix, icout, k - 1 );
00093         }
00094 
00095         Q_k = I - gsl_vector_get(tau_qr, k - 1 ) * outer_prod ( v, v );
00096         Q = prec_prod(Q, Q_k);
00097 
00098     }
00099 
00100     Q = trans(Q);
00101     gsl_vector_free (tau_qr);
00102 
00103     // Calculate A * Q and store the result in A
00104     A = prec_prod(A, Q);
00105 
00106 
00107     // A = [A1 A2], so A2 is just a block of A
00108     ub::matrix<double> A2 = ub::matrix_range<ub::matrix<double> >(A,
00109             ub::range (0, N), ub::range (ngrid, 2*ngrid)
00110          );
00111 
00112     tmp = &A2(0,0);
00113     gsl_matrix_view gsl_A2
00114          = gsl_matrix_view_array (tmp, A2.size1(), A2.size2());
00115    
00116         
00117     gsl_vector *z = gsl_vector_alloc (ngrid);
00118     gsl_vector *tau_solve = gsl_vector_alloc (ngrid);  // already done!
00119     gsl_vector *residual = gsl_vector_alloc (N);
00120 
00121     gsl_linalg_QR_decomp (&gsl_A2.matrix, tau_solve);
00122     gsl_linalg_QR_lssolve (&gsl_A2.matrix, tau_solve, &gsl_b.vector, z, residual);
00123 
00124     // Next two cycles assemble vector from y (which is zero-vector) and z
00125     // (which we just got by gsl_linalg_QR_lssolve)
00126 
00127     for (int i = 0; i < ngrid; i++ ) {
00128            x[i] = 0.0;
00129     }
00130 
00131     for (int i = ngrid; i < 2 * ngrid; i++ ) {
00132            x[i] = gsl_vector_get(z, i - ngrid);
00133     }
00134 
00135     // To get the final answer this vector should be multiplied by matrix Q
00136     // TODO: here i changed the sign, check again! (victor)
00137     x = -prec_prod( Q, x );
00138 
00139     gsl_vector_free (z);
00140     gsl_vector_free (tau_solve);
00141     gsl_vector_free (residual);
00142 #endif
00143 }
